resources.string:
Trak makes it easier for you to track your diet, your sport and, if applicable, your period.
To make this as good as possible, we first need some information from you.

All this data will only be stored in encrypted form for data processing and will not be passed on to third parties. 
It can be deleted and changed at any time.
Is your body able to menstruate?
I agree to the mentioned purposes of use above.
In order to determine your correct vital signs, we need your age.
